title: adidas Men's Essentials 3-Stripes Tricot Jogger Pants
description: Men's track pants with a tapered cut
Regular tapered fit is not tight and not loose, with a close fit on the legs
Drawcord on elastic waist lets you customize your fit
Front pockets for storage; Cuffed hems for a snug feel
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials

They're called warm-up pants for a reason. The perfect layer to get your mind and muscles ready, these adidas track pants are made from classic sport tricot for a smooth look and feel. The drawcord-elastic waist and cuffed hems help them stay in place. Take them off once you're in the zone, and pull them right back on when it's time to head out. The sleek style isn't limited to your workout though. 3-Stripes are all about versatility.
